name: Top Master! Version 2-5
description:
Top Master is a tycoon game where you (attempt to) beat fellow spinners in top battles. Each time you win, you get a certain amount of W.X.P (Win Experience Points) depending on who you defeat. Boosters also exist as a battling feature. Please let me know of any bugs or glitches you find as soon as you do! Everything you do is saved.

[ Made using: https://scratch.mit.edu ] 

[ All content is original, other than specific sound effects used within the game ]
